desc: Our pyramids are all handmade with love, using the highest quality gemstones and organic resin. They are based on the work of Dr. Wilhelm Reich who first developed orgonite. The theory is that the special combination of metals, organic resin, and crystals orgonite pyramids help with a huge variety of issues.

layout.text: Welcome to Enlightened Orgonite! We're so grateful you found us. Are you ready to invite more positive vibrations into your life with our special healing Orgonite pyramids?
